Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
  Pizza

 class Pizza
extends java.lang.Object

Pizza class. It is only a vehicle to employ the pizza's components created by the various pizza factories of the system.

Constructor Detail

Pizza

Pizza(AbstractCrust crust,
      AbstractCheese cheese)
Pizza constructor. The arguments of the constructor depend on the style of the pizza, e.g., low-calorie, regular, gourmet, etc.

Parameters:
crust - The crust component of this pizza.
cheese - The cheese component of this pizza.
Method Detail

calories

int calories()
Compute the total calories of this pizza by adding the calories of each component.

Returns:
The total calories of this pizza.
